Increasing distances by the approx following: 1M 4F: 25yds 1M 6F & 2M: 33yds The Straight Course has been divided in two with a rail in the middle of the course form the 1m Start to 2.5F from the winning line. The standside will be used for this meeting.

data.weather: We have had a damp September (65mm) and 22mm ten days ago . So a good base. No measurable rain over the weekend and quite warm and blustery.Dry Monday and Tuesday. FORECAST. We had a dry night, blustery and mild. Some rain due approx. 11am (1-3mm)and remaining blustery and 15C.
data.other: Any inquiries call Simon Sherwood 07836215639. I would describe the going as "Good ground for a good ground horse". Great grass cover and no jar .50:50 Good to good to firm.
data.rail: Ludlow Bend is 10m out and Stable Bend out 5m. Add to distances. Race1+42yds,Race2+77yds,Race3+70yds,Race4+42yds,Race5+65yds,Race 6+77yds,Race7+42yds.
